FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In southeast, cyclonic becoming northerly or northeasterly, 3 to 5, occasionally 6 in south. In northwest, cyclonic mainly northerly 3 to 5 becoming variable 3 or less, then becoming southwesterly 4 to 6 later in west.
Sea state
In southeast, very rough becoming rough, then occasionally moderate later. in northwest, rough or very rough becoming moderate or rough.
Weather
In southeast, showers, thundery at first. In northwest, showers then fair, then rain later in west.
Visibility
In southeast, good, occasionally poor at first. In northwest, moderate or good, occasionally poor later in west.
